website_summaries.verdict: Understated and versatile Fourth of July wear that could be worn all summer.
pros: Also comes in a red-top with blue striped shorts version
comes in baby sizes up to child's 8
Clothing could be worn all season mixed and matched with other pieces
cons: Very soft fabric is almost like pajamas

customer_reviews.title: Cute,soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got nervous when it came down to washing.I read reviews about it looking faded once washed.Of course when I recieved them it had a wicked strong odor from the packaging.I dont use the dryer on many of my kids clothes and I've washed this outfit about 3 or 4 times and with air drying it looks just as good as the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shorts a little large - quality outfit
customer_reviews.text: The shorts are a little large and when you use the draw string it bunches them all up. Other than that this is a quality outfit. The material is wonderful, washes nicely, my son loves it. Everybody fawned over his outfit on July 4th. Very happy with the purchase despite the size of the shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love them ! Nice material. pockets in shorts Nice enough to wear as clothes not just pjs !
customer_reviews.author: Denise J.

customer_reviews.title: fine
customer_reviews.text: the outfit was fine, it looks better in person then on the computer, the price was a little high for a simple pattern
customer_reviews.author: kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it on my grandson! Well made, soft and comfortable. Bright colors and nice fabric! Recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: GFD

customer_reviews.title: The shorts are cool but the belt line is made pretty narrow so ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cute. The shirt did fade after just a couple washes. The shorts are cool but the belt line is made pretty narrow so if u have a chunky monkey. Then this isn’t for u.
customer_reviews.author: Laris

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great outfit for my son for cultural day at school! Super comfortable material, fit well, and looks adorable! Great product and would highly recommend. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: The shorts are ridiculous. They came apart at the seam in the crotch. Worn for two hours and had to throw them away. Poor
customer_reviews.author: Alyshia Viljoen

customer_reviews.title: Cute 4th of July outfit!
customer_reviews.text: Fits somewhat small. It’s a good idea to size up if you’re getting anywhere near the next size.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fields

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Very festive! Somewhat cheap as the stars have worn on the shirt and it's only been worn twice and washed three times, but good for pictures :-)
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best 4th of July outfit I’ve purchased for my son!
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Hughes

customer_reviews.title: 4th of July outfit for boys
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait For my son to wear on 4th of July
customer_reviews.author: Ana Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my two year old. He looked very festive in our neighborhood Independence Day Parade.
customer_reviews.author: Jansk

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Not crazy about the fabric. Feels more like pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: B. Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Sizing issue
customer_reviews.text: The outfit was way to small for 9 mos. it was more like 3 mo. I gave it away
customer_reviews.author: marilyn calvert

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute outfit. Ordered it for my son to wear in his Flag Day show at school.
customer_reviews.author: superchelle

customer_reviews.title: Shorts are small!!
customer_reviews.text: The shorts are TINY. Definitely not 12 month shorts. The shirt fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is sized right and material is good quality!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Sizing is sized right and material is good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect outfit for my son for Fourth of July.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Fits as expected and super cute on baby.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton E. Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this outfit! Perfect for the fourth! Quick shipping and very responsive!
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

product_meta.title: Unique Baby Boys Patriotic 4th of July 2-Piece Summer Outfit
feature_bullets: STYLE [4TH OF JULY]: Red, White and Blue American flag designs and themes will get your little one feeling proud to be an American this 4th of July! Perfect for the Independence Day barbeque or fireworks show! Queue the Star Spangled Banner!

EGYPTIAN MANUFACTURED: Egypt has maintained its reputation for high quality textile and garment production since ancient times; and that's exactly what we sought in our manufacturing process. The 95% high quality Egyptian cotton and 5 % stretchy lycra fabric is SUPER soft and comfortable. Premium dye's ensure that your outfit won't fade or run.

WHAT KIDS LOVE: Fun Prints & Seasonal Themes! Seasonal themes and fun prints immerse the children in the magic of the season. A little style goes a long way to get the kids excited about wearing their clothes!
GIFTABILITY: Makes a perfect holiday gift, birthday present or "just because" for your very own little love.
UNIQUE BABY: Commited to quality and to your satisfaction, UB has an outfit for every holiday!
